explanation: [0-0] On muddy ground, many mud bricks are laid out. A rope is tied to one of the bricks. A neat row of mud bricks is visible on the ground, and a person in blue clothing appears nearby.

[0-2] Next, a person picks up a mud brick. The scene switches to a larger outdoor area. A man in a purple shirt, blue jeans, and a blue hat is cutting mud bricks with a tool. Another man in a light gray shirt and camouflage pants uses a tool to cut another pile of mud bricks.

[2-4] The scene then changes. The two men are standing in the distance, pulling the cut mud bricks. The man on the left is wearing a black jacket, and the man on the right is wearing a blue jacket. The man in gray continues to cut mud bricks.
